member.name: T:ShaderSwapper.ShaderSwapper
member.summary: A static library for upgrading stubbed shaders to actual shaders at runtime.

member.name: M:ShaderSwapper.ShaderSwapper.UpgradeStubbedShadersAsync(UnityEngine.AssetBundle)
member.summary: Asynchronously upgrade all stubbed shaders in an asset bundle to real shaders.
member.remarks: See the mod page for example usage.
member.returns: An which can be started as a or yielded in an .

member.name: M:ShaderSwapper.ShaderSwapper.UpgradeStubbedShaderAsync(UnityEngine.Material)
member.summary: Asynchronously convert the stubbed shader of a single material to a real shader.
member.returns: An which can be started as a or yielded in an .

member.name: M:ShaderSwapper.ShaderSwapper.UpgradeStubbedShaders(UnityEngine.AssetBundle)
member.summary: Immediately upgrade all stubbed shaders in an asset bundle to real shaders.
member.remarks: This method will block the main thread until completed. should be used instead.

member.name: M:ShaderSwapper.ShaderSwapper.UpgradeStubbedShader(UnityEngine.Material)
member.summary: Immediately convert the stubbed shader of a single material to a real shader.
member.remarks: This method will block the main thread until completed. should be used instead.
